comparisons.ground_truth: Central core disease (CCD) is an inherited neuromuscular disorder characterised by central cores on muscle biopsy and clinical features of a congenital myopathy.
comparisons.model_output: Patient-derived heterozygous deletion c.14145_14156delCTACTGGGACA (p.Asn4715_Asp4718del) in RYR1; spontaneous (not engineered)

comparisons.ground_truth: Central core disease (CCD) is an inherited neuromuscular disorder characterised by central cores on muscle biopsy and clinical features of a congenital myopathy.
A conduction block of the left branch of the bundle of His. This manifests as a generalized disturbance of QRS morphology on EKG.
Forms of cardiomyopathy that are not related to known coronary artery disease.

This line is engineered to include a genetic reporter of  CX3CR1 expression which results in expression of tdTomato and nanoluciferase in series with CX3CR1 expression.  The construct also includes a neomycin resistance cassette flanked by FRT sites.  One allele of the CX3CR1 gene contains the following construct targeted to the stop codon:  IRES-tdTomato-T2A-Nanoluc-pA-FRT-neo-FRT.
comparisons.model_output: Targeted insertion of a dual reporter donor cassette encoding tdTomato and nanoluciferase into the CX3CR1 locus using CRISPR/Cas9 nickase-based targeting; donor contained selection cassettes and homology arms.

comparisons.ground_truth: Heterozygous COL2A1 c.2155C>T  (p.Arg719Cys) variant was introduced to COL2A1 exon 33. A synonymous change was also introduced.
comparisons.model_output: Introduction of a heterozygous COL2A1 exon 33 c.2155C>T (p.R719C) mutation into the control iPSC line MCRIi019-A to generate MCRIi019-A-6.
